expo.name: PharmaGuide
expo.description: PharmaGuide: AI-powered supplement and medication interaction checker with offline-capable analysis, barcode scanning, and HIPAA-compliant privacy protection.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PharmaGuide uses your camera to scan product barcodes and supplement labels for safety analysis. All data is processed locally and encrypted for HIPAA compliance.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: PharmaGuide can integrate with HealthKit to provide personalized supplement recommendations based on your health data. All information remains private and encrypted on your device.
